bike.description: 6061 TIG-welded aluminum, all-new sport comfort design with low-standover/upright ride position, replaceable derailleur hanger, center-mount kickstand bracket
bike.paint_description: M: Monterey Red or Palladium Silver   S/T: Monterey Red or Sage

components.description: SR-M3010 coil-spring suspension with external preload, alloy crown, CP stanchions, mini-boots, 50mm travel
Alex DC-25 double-wall alloy rims, 32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR, 14g stainless steel spokes
Jamis Sport Comfort, 26 x 1.95", with puncture-resistant casing
Shimano Altus M310 rear, Shimano M191 31.8mm top swing/dual pull front
Shimano M171 alloy crank with 48/38/28 chainrings, 170mm crank length, with chainguard
Comfort platform with TPE non-slip insert
Hi-rise comfort, 15D sweep x 80mm rise x 640mm wide
Jamis alloy, angle-adjustable, 90mm ext x 150mm quill (13.5–17.5") or 110mm ext x 180mm quill (18–21")
Suspension, alloy micro-adjust, 350mm x 27.2mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis Comfort with memory foam, synthetic suede top, burnished side panels and bumper springs
Tektro forged alloy direct pull brakes with Tektro Tenera alloy comfort levers
